sentences.sContent: The publicity blitz is aimed at persuading Americans that government help will get them out of their economic mess.
sentences.sContent_eng: The publicity blitz is aimed at persuading Americans that government help will get them out of their economic mess.
sentences.sCn: 这场公共闪电战的目标是说服美国人相信政府将帮助他们走出经济大混乱。

trans.tranOther: a sudden military attack, especially from the air
